bounceBallTooltip: Bounce a ball off of an object.
finalLevel: Tahniah! Anda berjaya menyelesaikan puzzle terakhir.
ifTooltip: Jika ada laluan ke arah yang ditentukan, lakukan beberapa tindakan.
ifelseTooltip: Jika terdapat lorong dalam arah yang ditentukan, maka lakukan tindakan blok pertama. Sebaliknya, lakukan tindakan untuk blok kedua.
incrementOpponentScoreTooltip: Add one to the current opponent score.
incrementPlayerScoreTooltip: Add one to the current player score.
isWallTooltip: Returns true if there is a wall here
moveLeftTooltip: Move the paddle to the left.
moveRightTooltip: Move the paddle to the right.
nextLevel: Tahniah! Anda telah melengkapkan puzzle ini.
numBlocksNeeded: Puzzle ini boleh diselesaikan dengan %1 blok.
reinfFeedbackMsg: Anda boleh tekan butang "Cuba lagi" untuk kembali bermain.
setBallSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed of the ball
setPaddleSpeedTooltip: Sets the speed of the paddle
shareBounceTwitter: Check out the Bounce game I made. I wrote it myself with @codeorg
turnTooltip: Pusingkan saya ke kiri atau kanan 90 darjah.
whenBallInGoalTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball enters the goal.
whenBallMissesPaddleTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball misses the paddle.
whenDownTooltip: Execute the actions below when the down arrow key is pressed.
whenGameStartsTooltip: Execute the actions below when the game starts.
whenLeftTooltip: Execute the actions below when the left arrow key is pressed.
whenPaddleCollidedTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball collides with a paddle.
whenRightTooltip: Execute the actions below when the right arrow key is pressed.
whenUpTooltip: Execute the actions below when the up arrow key is pressed.
whenWallCollidedTooltip: Execute the actions below when a ball collides with a wall.
whileTooltip: Ulangi tindakan yang tertutup sehingga titik penamat dicapai.
